articles.title: All-Korean Committee Calls for Opening up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification This Year
articles.content:
All-Korean Committee Calls for Opening up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification This Year 
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The North, the South and the Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration (All-Korean Committee) issued a resolution Wednesday. 
					 The resolution said that the formation of All-Korean Committee on March 4, 2005 enabled Koreans to push forward the work of implementing the north-south declarations as a nationwide movement both in name and reality. It went on:
					
					 The committee will invariably hold fast to the July 4 joint statement, the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the reunification charter and reunification programme common to the nation and take the lead in putting them into practice.  
					
					 The committee will make sustained efforts to hold brisk dialogue and negotiations, exchange and contact between the north and the south, fully support good agreements made in this course and take the lead in implementing them.
					
					 It will resolutely reject the confrontation between social systems that denies and slanders the idea and system of the other party, and strongly foil all kinds of hostile acts and unreasonable interference in internal affairs by outside forces that lay an artificial obstacle in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It will make efforts on its own initiative to remove the danger of war, defuse the tension and provide an environment for the reconciliation and peace of the nation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It will launch more dynamic nation-wide movement for peace against war in order to resolutely frustrate the reckless joint military drills of the inside and outside forces seeking division of Koreans.
					
					 It will warn Japan against rushing headlong into the road for emerging a military giant as it embellishes the past invasions it made against the Korean nation and Asian countries to make them its colonies.
					
					 It will also further a nation-wide movement and activities for gaining international solidarity to force Japan to stop distortion of history, attempt at grabbing Tok Islets and discrimination against Koreans in Japan and to make an apology and reparation for its past history of aggression.
					
					 The resolution called for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification at any cost by the concerted efforts of all Koreans this year that marks the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, adding: 
					
					 The committee will sponsor with splendor great reunification festivals involving delegates from the north and the south and abroad on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 It will also make visits, contacts, meetings for reunification, cooperation and exchange brisk among organizations of Koreans of various circles and in different fields and regions including those of workers, farmers, youth and students, women, media persons and religionists.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Called to Turn Out to Implement Joint Declarations and Defend Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Called to Turn Out to Implement Joint Declarations and Defend Peace against War
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued an appeal on Feb. 26 calling for turning out in the efforts to implement the north-south joint declarations and defend peace against war.
					  The youth and students in the south and the north and abroad should conduct more brisk activities to preserve and implement the south-north joint declarations in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, the appeal said.
					
					 It noted that the youth and students in the south and the north and abroad should wage a more brisk movement to oppose all war maneuvers and arms buildup threatening the existence of the nation, remove the root cause of war and defend peace.
					
					 It underscored the need to resolutely denounce the moves of the Japanese militarist forces for reinvasion, adding that they will not pardon any element threatening peace.
					
					 The appeal called for surely realizing the meeting of youth and students in the south and the north and abroad this year.

articles.title: Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Tour Mupho Bivouac and Taehongdan Area
articles.content:
Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Tour Mupho Bivouac and Taehongdan Area
						
 Taehongdan, March 4 (KCNA) -- Senior officials in charge of administrative affairs from across the country toured the Mupho Bivouac and the Taehongdan area on Wednesday.
					 President Kim Il Sung camped in the Mupho Bivouac in May, Juche 28 (1939) when he led the advance of the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the homeland.
					
					 He convened a meeting of commanding officers of the KPRA there and set forth tasks for ensuring its advance toward the Taehongdan area.
					
					 There are the site of the headquarters, the site where anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk cooked rice and one of campfire.
					
					 There is also the Mupho angling site where leader Kim Jong Il mapped out his great plan to accomplish the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 Upon arriving at the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site after touring the Mupho Bivouac, the members of the study tour group were briefed on the mosaic depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk and went round various places of the battle site.
					
					 Then, they arrived at the Taehongdan Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 They placed bouquets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area.
					
					 That day they camped near the Mubong Workers' District, holding meetings for hearing impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerillas and their tour.
					
					 During the tour they handed goods necessary for managing the revolutionary sites and revolutionary battle sites and conducted various political activities among masses.

articles.title: Festival of Science and Technology Held
articles.content:
Festival of Science and Technology Held 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The 30th Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture took place from Monday through Wednesday. 
					 The festival was held divided into architecture, city management, land and environment protection, architectural engineering, construction engineering, building materials, construction machines and IT panels.
					
					 Present at the festival were teachers, researchers, postgraduate students and students of the university. 
					
					 More than 180 scientific and technical achievements were presented by units and individuals and good successes and experience were exchanged.

articles.title: Functional Cosmetics Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Functional Cosmetics Popular in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- "Unhasu"-trademarked cosmetics, made by the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory in the DPRK, is now enjoying popularity among the local people.
					 The factory produces scores of varieties of functional cosmetics with extracts of aloe, wormwood, insam and other natural substances. They include emollient cream, astringent, nutrient moisturizer and UV cream.
					
					 Their users would say that those cosmetics are better than imported ones as they are very efficacious for skin aging with no side effects.
					
					 The emollient cosmetics help transform the structure of cutinized skin into that of normal skin.

articles.title: January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
articles.content:
January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- From olden times, the Korean people have enjoyed the January 15th of the lunar calendar as a folk holiday. 
					 In the evening of the day, they have enjoyed a full moon with a desire for rich harvest and happiness.
					
					 According to historical data, it was a custom to take sweet rice dish on the day in the period of the Three Kingdoms (3rd century B.C.-7th century A.D.).
					
					 In the period of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), the January 15th of the lunar calendar was one of nine folk holidays. 
					
					 The Korean people ate noodle on the eve of the January 15th.
					
					 Included in the menu for the January 15th of lunar calendar were dishes cooked with nine kinds of dried edible herbs, laver-wrapped rice and taffy.
					
					 Meanwhile, people enjoyed the day, playing tug of war, kite-flying, and other folk games.
					
					 The January 15th of the lunar calendar falls on March 5 this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap forward through Movement for Creating Pyongyang Spirit and Pyongyang Speed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Leap forward through Movement for Creating Pyongyang Spirit and Pyongyang Speed
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un highly praised Pyongyang City for doing a lot of work these days during his field guidance to various units in the city from the outset of the year and reposed deep trust in Pyongyangites to create Pyongyang spirit and Pyongyang speed in this manner.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial says that this reflects his noble hope that Pyongyang City should be a standard-bearer in implementing the behests of the leaders and defending the party policies and become an engine steering the general offensive for hastening the final victory.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The flames of the drive for creating Pyongyang spirit and Pyongyang speed are raging at a time when all service personnel and people are dashing ahead toward a bright future with a firm confidence in victory.
					
					 Pyongyang spirit means stamina of Korea and the tempo of Pyongyang development means the dynamic step of the country.
					
					 Eye-opening changes made in the capital city over the past three years represent the steadfast faith and strong pluck of Kim Jong Un who works hard to put our country on the high eminence of the world and unshakable will of all service personnel and people to keep pace with his footsteps.
					
					 Pyongyang spirit should be based on the absolute loyalty to him and the resolution to devotedly implement the party policies. Pyongyang speed should be the one of supersonic plane, not the one of ship. This is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The whole country should keep pace with the struggle for creating Pyongyang spirit and Pyongyang speed to give further momentum to the onward movement.
					
					 Let us all create Pyongyang spirit and Pyongyang speed for the final victory.

articles.title: DPRK Will Never Pardon S. Korean Warmongers' Crimes against National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Never Pardon S. Korean Warmongers' Crimes against National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers are so shameless as to describe Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as "annual defensive ones," but they are typical war exercises for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The saber-rattling is a dangerous fuse to create a catastrophic situation on the Korean peninsula and an anti-reunification act of souring the atmosphere of dialogue and improved relations between the north and the south and extremely escalating confrontation with compatriots, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK had already advised the south Korean authorities to halt military exercises against the other party. But they are staging more frantic saber-rattling together with the U.S., claiming that "it would be staged as long as there exists alliance" and "it is irrelevant" to north-south dialogue. This war drumbeat is driving the inter-Korean relations into an irretrievable catastrophe.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have spread a ridiculous story that the north-south dialogue was not opened because the DPRK did not "respond to their proposal for dialogue". But all facts go to clearly prove that they are the very ones who are viciously blocking the dialogue.
					
					 History and the nation will never pardon the puppet warmongers working with bloodshot eyes to do harm to compatriots in the north in league with foreign forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Insulting Patriotic Spirit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Insulting Patriotic Spirit
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive in an "address on March 1" talked rubbish that she "would bring about economic growth equivalent to that in 30 years to come through three years of economic innovation", keeping mum about the blame for economic failure and deterioration of people's living caused after she took office. Closing her eyes to Japan's moves for grabbing Tok Islets getting extreme recently, she begged her master to write a "history of partnership in 50 years to come" together with him over the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the issue of distortion of history textbooks. As regards the inter-Korean relations, she pretended to do something for "dialogue" and "cooperation" but took issue with the just nuclear deterrence of the north and urged it to "dismantle nukes" and opt for "opening" and "change".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday terms the "address" made by Park Geun Hye treacherous outbursts intended to deceive and mock at the people, kowtow to foreign forces and escalate the confrontation with compatriots at any cost. 
					
					 It is a tragedy and a political chicanery provoking laughter of all people that Park, a puppet of foreign forces, made an "address" on the significant day when the Korean nation not yielding to foreign forces fully demonstrated its spirit of independence and patriotic stamina, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 She talked about the nation's "independence and sovereignty" and "peace" in her "address on March 1" after kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed to bring a nuclear disaster to the inviolable territory of the country together with the U.S. This is an unpardonable insult to the noble patriotic spirit of the nation and fellow countrymen.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly concerned for north-south dialogue and cooperation, they should halt war maneuvers against the other dialogue party, to begin with.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Reckless War Drumbeats
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Reckless War Drumbeats
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean peninsula has now reached the brink of a war, due to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war games being kicked up again by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces across south Korea.
					 The saber-rattling involving U.S. ground, naval and air task forces in south Korea and its vicinity and hundreds of thousands of troops of the south Korean puppet army is aimed at "eliminating" the headquarters of the DPRK and "occupying Pyongyang" by mounting a surprise preemptive attack. They are dangerous actual war drills to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 Early this year, U.S. President Obama unhesitatingly blustered that it is a policy goal of the USA to stamp out the DPRK's ideology and "bring down" its social system. The drills being staged against this backdrop are an unpardonable provocation being perpetrated pursuant to the U.S. strategy to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The present reality in which the U.S. and the puppet forces are becoming evermore pronounced in their moves to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK compels its service personnel and people to make a stern decision.
					
					 The enemy forces are running riot, unaware of the DPRK's will yet.
					
					The latter has never stepped back but has always emerged victorious in the campaign for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 It is clearly proven by history in which it has won victories, weathering all difficulties.
					
					The U.S. is now bluffing but it can never bring down the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK is neither Balkans nor Iraq and Libya.
					
					 If the U.S. is to deal with the DPRK by counting on the size of its territory, population and economic and military power, it will be bound to sustain a defeat in every battle.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to blow up the bases of the U.S. imperialists and their allies.
					
					 From the moment a new retaliatory measure is taken by the DPRK, the hostile forces will have to face the most miserable and painful fate.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are joining in the war rehearsal, seized with a wild dream of stifling the DPRK by taking advantage of the outsiders' power. This is as foolish an act as digging up their graves together with aggressors.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula at last, the U.S. and the puppet forces will never evade their responsibilities for ensuing disastrous consequences.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have a will to counter any slightest provocation of the enemy with a great war of justice for achieving national reunification and will never miss the chance.

articles.title: Protest Actions Staged across S. Korea against U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Protest Actions Staged across S. Korea against U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills  
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Protest actions were staged on Monday across south Korea against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers. 
					 The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea made up of more than 50 civic and social organizations held a press conference in Seoul at which they held that the joint military drills should be halted in order to put an end to vicious cycle of war rehearsals and solve the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a joint press conference with different civic and social organizations outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul. 
					
					 Speakers there urged the authorities to stop at once the joint saber-rattling. 
					
					 Its affiliated organizations simultaneously held press conferences and staged demonstrations in Pusan, Inchon, Taejon, Kwangju, Taegu, Puchon of Kyonggi Province and other parts of south Korea. 
					
					 The Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration at a press conference said the above-said military drills are dangerous as they may spark a war. 
					
					 More than 20 organizations in North Jolla Province including the provincial headquarters of the above-said committee held a press conference in Jonju in demand of a halt to the joint military exercises. 
					
					 The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference outside the puppet Ministry of Unification. 
					
					 Similar protest actions took place in various parts of south Korea against the U.S.-south Korea saber-rattling.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Citizens Committee for Promoting Construction of Girl's Statue for Peace in south Korea held a meeting in Taejon on March 1 at which it called for settling the issue of  sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south  Korea.
					 At the meeting speakers said the girl's statue was erected in Taejon to indict Japan for its hair-raising sexual slavery.
					
					 The statue reflects the will of people of all social standings of the city not to allow the past history in  which human rights were violated due to war and violence to repeat itself but to force Japan make an apology and reparation for its past crimes, they noted.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is shunning Japan's evermore serious distortion of history and paying no attention to the solution of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, they deplored. They called for fighting to have the issue of the sexual slavery settled and build a peaceful world free from war.

articles.title: March 1 Popular Uprising Marked by Korean Youth and Students in U.S.
articles.content:
March 1 Popular Uprising Marked by Korean Youth and Students in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- An event of Korean youth and students in the U.S. took place in Los Angeles on March 1, the 96th anniversary of the March 1 Popular Uprising, according to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 A declaration on independence dating back to that period was read out. 
					
					 Diverse events including painting show denouncing sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army took place.
					
					 Victims of the sexual slavery are dying without getting apology or reparation from Japan, speakers said. 
					
					 The bitter pain suffered by Koreans under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists is still going on, they deplored.
					
					 They said the young people would pool their efforts to carry forward the fighting spirit of the ancestors with which they shouted the hurrah for independence to defend the sovereignty of the country

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Congolese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Congolese Paper
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The gist of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was carried by the Congolese newspaper Le Patriot on February 23.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause in the DPRK to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Kuwaiti Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Kuwaiti Papers
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kuwaiti papers carried articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Kuwaiti paper Al-Anba on Feb. 16 carried a special write-up illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The paper in an article said that Kim Jong Il has been praised as a great master of independent politics. It went on:
					
					 It is thanks to the transparent independent line of the great man that the DPRK has grown stronger century after century.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who also paid deep attention to building a new independent world, energetically conducted external activities for strengthening the anti-imperialist and independent forces.
					
					 The might and vitality of his independent politics were fully displayed when the great June 15 era of reunification was provided in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Thus the august name of the great man who devoted himself to the independent cause is shining brightly as that of a great master of independent politics in the world history of politics.
					
					 The Kuwaiti paper The Times on Feb. 15 carried an article titled "The great HE Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary feats will shine forever".
					
					 He steered the drive for defending socialism to victory with his original Songun politics and put history on the orbit of independence, the article said, adding that it is a great feat only he could have performed.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked by Foreign Newspapers 
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups together with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 The Congolese paper Le Patriot on Feb. 23 carried articles under the caption "DPRK celebrates 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il." 
					
					 The paper in its preface said that February 16 this year is the significant day, his 73rd birth anniversary. 
					
					 He, who was born and grew up nurturing patriotic soul in Mt. Paektu, energetically worked without rest for the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people, reunification of the country and the cause of global independence. 
					
					 His idea and cause are being successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The February 15-28 issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il-great leader of the DPRK" in praise of his revolutionary career and exploits. 
					
					 The paper carried news of celebrations of the Day of the Shining Star held in Bulgaria. 
					
					 The Mexican newspaper Unidad Nacional on Feb. 15 carried an article titled "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: U.S. Fears DPRK: Bulgarian Figure
articles.content:
U.S. Fears DPRK: Bulgarian Figure 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, contributed an article titled "Human rights" to the February 15-28 issue of the newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo. 
					 The U.S. is desperately launching human rights racket against the DPRK, the article said, and went on:
					
					 At the end of the Second World War the U.S. dropped A-bombs in Japan, the first of its kind in human history, leaving hundreds of thousands of people dead, and recently killed a lot of innocent civilians in Iraq and Afghanistan. 
					
					 However, the U.S. has not been called to task for its crimes against humanity.
					
					 Then, what's the crime against humanity the DPRK has to be punished for?
					
					 There is no unemployed and homeless in the DPRK. Compulsory free education system, free medical care and other good social policies are being enforced in the DPRK. 
					
					 Then, why does the West brand the DPRK as a "criminal"?
					
					 It is because the DPRK is not giving up socialism. 
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to stifle Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 But, the Korean people have never been yielded to any pressure. 
					
					 The U.S. threatened to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK. So, the DPRK had access to strong nuclear deterrence to cope with the U.S. threats.
					
					 The U.S. and its allied forces raised the "human rights issue" to threaten the DPRK. 
					
					 However, the DPRK is unfazed and the U.S. fears the DPRK.

articles.title: CCN llama a abrir ancho camino para reunificacion independiente
articles.content:
CCN llama a abrir ancho camino para reunificacion independiente
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los comites norteno, sureno y ultramarino para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio aprobaron el dia 4 una resolucion.
					El documento  subraya que la constitucion en  el 4 de marzo de 2005 del Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio posibilito impulsar vigorosamente como movimiento pannacional la ejecucion de la declaracion Norte-Sur.
					
					Expone la decision de ejecutar al frente la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre manteniendolas como carta y programa comunes nacionales para la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Insiste en activar el dialogo, las negociaciones, el intercambio y el contacto entre ambas partes coreanas, apoyar buenos acuerdos Norte-Sur que se logren en este proceso y seguir esforzandose por ponerlos en la practica. 
					
					Es necesario rechazar el enfrentamiento de sistemas que niega y calumnia la ideologia y regimen de la contraparte y frustrar los actos hostiles de toda indole y las injustas intervenciones de las fuerzas extranjeras que ponen obstaculos artificiales a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, destaca.
					
					Enfatiza que hara esfuerzos iniciativos para eliminar el peligro de guerra y aliviar la tension y lograr la reconciliacion nacional y el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					ã€€Manifiesta la decision de dinamizar mas el movimiento pannacional contra la guerra y por la defensa de paz para detener los imprudentes ejercicios belicos conjuntos de las fuerzas separatistas internas y externas.
					
					Subraya la necesidad de activar el movimiento pannacional y las actividades solidarias internacionales para advertir al gobierno japones que embellece sus actos de agresion colonial cometidos contra la nacion coreana y otros paises asiaticos y se dirige a la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar, e impedirle la tergiversacion de la historia, la usurpacion territorial y la discriminacion nacional a los coreanos residentes en Japon y cobrar su disculpa e indemnizacion por sus crimenes del  pasado.
					
					Llama a toda la nacion unir sus fuerzas para abrir sin falta este ano del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					Exhorta a celebrar con solemnidad los grandes festivales nacionales comunes pro-reunificacion con la participacion de los delegados de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar y activar los viajes, contactos, reuniones, cooperacion e intercambio por la reunificacion por sectores, por regiones y por capas tales como obreros, campesinos, jovenes y estudiantes, mujeres, hombres de prensa y religiosos.

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana publica un llamamiento
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana publica un llamamiento
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Direccion de Estudiante Juvenil de Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publico el dia 26 de febrero un llamamiento exhortando a levantarse en la lucha por ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y por preservar la paz antibelica.
					El documento subraya que todos los estudiantes del Sur, el Norte y el ultramar deben desplegar con dinamismo las actividades practicas para defender y materializar las declaraciones conjuntas Sur-Norte a base del ideal del 15 de Junio.
					
					Enfatiza que deben librar energica campana contra los ejercicios de guerra de todo tipo y el aumento armamentista, que amenaza la existencia de la nacion, y por eliminar la raiz de guerra y preservar la paz.
					
					Refiere que deben intolerar, denunciar y rechazar categoricamente las maniobras del militarismo japones enloquecido en la reagresion.
					
					Destaca que los jovenes estudiantiles no permitiran a ningun elemento que amenaza la paz.
					
					Concluye senalando la necesidad de realizar sin falta en este ano el encuentro de los jovenes estudiantes del Sur, el Norte y  el  ultramar.

articles.title: Cuadros de administracion recorren Mupho y Taehongdan
articles.content:
Cuadros de administracion recorren Mupho y Taehongdan
						
Taehongdan, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los cuadros de administracion de todo el pais recorrieron el dia 4 el campamento de Mupho y la zona de Taehongdan. 
					En mayo del 28 (1939) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung acampo en Mupho en medio de la marcha hacia la patria al frente del grueso del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea.
					
					El Presidente convoco ahi una reunion de comandantes del ERPC y presento las tareas para el avance a la zona de Taehongdan.
					
					En el campamento se ven el lugar donde la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk cocinaba, el sitio de fogata, etc.
					
					Tambien esta el sitio de pesca de Mupho donde el Dirigente Kim Jong Il maduro el grandioso proyecto para la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo.
					
					Llegados al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Sinsadong, los participantes escucharon las explicaciones ante el mural de mosaicos con las imagenes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la Heroina Kim Jong Suk y dieron vueltas por varios puntos del lugar. 
					
					En el lugar de campo de batalla revolucionaria de Taehongdan, rindieron homenaje al Presidente tras colocar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce en el Obelisco a la Victoria en la Batalla de la Zona de Musan.
					
					Este dia, ellos instalaron tienda de campana en los alrededores del poblado obrero de Mubong y sostuvieron el encuentro de presentacion de las reminiscencias de los guerrilleros antijaponeses y la presentacion de impresiones del recorrido. 
					
					Durante el recorrido, ellos donaron los materiales necesarios para el mantenimiento de los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario y de batalla revolucionaria y realizaron varias labores politicas  entre las masas.

articles.title: Concluido festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Concluido festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 2 al 4 el 30o festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang.
					En la cita dividida en las secciones de arquitectura, administracion urbana, proteccion territorial y ambiental, ingenieria arquitectonica y de construccion, materiales de construccion, maquinas de construccion y tecnologia informatica estuvieron presentes los profesores, investigadores, cursantes de instituto doctoral y estudiantes.
					
					En la ocasion se publicaron en colectivo y en individuos mas de 180 de datos cientificos y tecnicos y se intercambiaron los exitos y las experiencias.
